Jack Grealish has been given the thumbs up to impress in Project Restart by former Premier League title winner Gareth Barry.

articles.author: Lucas Rezende
articles.title: They said what?! Pros react to Sean O’Malley’s KO, Neil Magny’s win at UFC 250 - Bloody Elbow
articles.description: Sean O’Malley knocked out Eddie Wineland and Neil Mangny outpointed Anthony Rocco Martin at UFC 250. On Twitter, pro fighters reacted to the bouts.
articles.content: Sean OMalley knocked out Eddie Wineland and Neil Mangny outpointed Anthony Rocco Martin at UFC 250. On Twitter, pro fighters reacted to the bouts.
